EmailTemplate.subject: Cleanup needed on Opportunities with Unrealistic Close Dates
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Sales Rep,
the following opportunities in your forecast seem to have an unrealistic Closed Date, ie. the Stage is low (1-3), yet the forecasted close date is within the next 30 days. Please update the information on the opportunity accordingly.
